## Data
```{r echo=FALSE}

# create line plot
plot(Nile) 

# create dropdown selector for histogram
inputPanel(
  selectInput("n_breaks", label= "Bins", c(10, 20, 30, 40), selected = 10)  #creates a dropdown selector
)

# create histogram
renderPlot({
hist(Nile, xlab= "Measurement", probability = TRUE, breaks = as.numeric(input$n_breaks)) 
})
```
